patternSteps.1: Ready Posture: Closed Ready Stance D
patternSteps.2: Step 1. Move the right foot to C forming a left walking stance toward D while executing a low inward block to D with the right knife-hand.
patternSteps.3: Step 2. Move the left foot to C forming a right walking stance toward D while executing a high side block to D with the left outer forearm.
patternSteps.4: Step 3. Execute a middle punch to D with the right fist while maintaining a right walking stance toward D.
patternSteps.5: Step 4. Execute a low twisting kick to D with the left foot keeping the position of the hands as they were in 3.
patternSteps.6: Step 5. Lower the left foot to D forming a left walking stance toward D while executing a downward block with an x-fist.
patternSteps.7: Step 6. Execute a rising block with the right knife-hand, maintaining a left walking stance toward D. Perform 5 and 6 in a continuous motion.
patternSteps.8: Step 7. Jump to D, forming a right x-stance toward BD while executing a high side strike to D with the right back fist bringing the left finger belly to the right side fist.
patternSteps.9: Step 8. Move the left foot to C forming a right L-stance toward C while executing a middle punch to C with the left fist.
patternSteps.10: Step 9. Execute a middle reverse turning kick to AC with the right foot.
patternSteps.11: Step 10. Lower the right foot to C in a stamping motion to form a sitting stance toward A while executing a middle side strike to C with the right knife-hand.
patternSteps.12: Step 11. Execute a middle side piercing kick to C with the left foot while turning clockwise pulling both hands in the opposite direction.
patternSteps.13: Step 12. Lower the left foot to C forming a left walking stance toward C while executing a high crescent punch with the right fist.
patternSteps.14: Step 13. Execute a middle turning punch with the left fist while forming a parallel stance toward C pulling the right foot. Perform in slow motion.
patternSteps.15: Step 14. Move the left foot to D forming a right walking stance toward C while executing a low inward block with the left knife-hand.
patternSteps.16: Step 15. Move the right foot to D forming a left walking stance toward C at the same time executing a high side block to C with the right outer forearm.
patternSteps.17: Step 16. Execute a middle punch to C with the left fist while maintaining a left walking stance toward C.
patternSteps.18: Step 17. Execute a low twisting kick to C with the right foot, keeping the position of the hands as they were in 16.
patternSteps.19: Step 18. Lower the right foot to C forming a right waling stance toward C while executing a downward block with an x-fist.
patternSteps.20: Step 19. Execute a rising block with the left knife-hand while maintaining a right walking stance toward C. Perform 18 and 19 in a continuous motion.
patternSteps.21: Step 20. Jump to C forming a left x-stance toward BC while executing a high side strike to C with the left back fist and bringing the right finger belly to the left side fist.
patternSteps.22: Step 21. Move the right foot to D, forming a left L-stance toward D while executing a middle punch to D with the right fist.
patternSteps.23: Step 22. Execute a middle reverse turning kick to AD with the left foot.
patternSteps.24: Step 23. Lower the left foot to D in a stamping motion to form a sitting stance toward A at the same time executing a middle side strike to D with a left knife-hand.
patternSteps.25: Step 24. Execute a middle side piercing kick to D with the right foot while turning counter-clockwise pulling both hands in the opposite direction.
patternSteps.26: Step 25. Lower the right foot to D forming a right walking stance toward D while executing a high crescent punch with the left fist.
patternSteps.27: Step 26. Execute a middle turning punch with the right fist while forming a parallel stance toward D pulling the left foot. Perform in slow motion.
patternSteps.28: Step 27. Move the right foot to D forming a right walking stance toward D at the same time executing a middle wedging block with a knife-hand.
patternSteps.29: Step 28. Execute a circular block to BD with the left reverse knife-hand while maintaining a right walking stance toward D.
patternSteps.30: Step 29. Execute a downward block with an alternate palm while forming a left rear foot stance toward D pulling the right foot.
patternSteps.31: Step 30. Execute a middle punch to D with the left fist while forming a left L-stance toward D slipping the right foot.
patternSteps.32: Step 31. Execute a low inward block to D with the right reverse knife-hand while shifting to C maintaining a left L-stance toward D.
patternSteps.33: Step 32. Move the left foot to D forming a left walking stance toward D while executing a middle wedging block with a knife-hand.
patternSteps.34: Step 33. Execute a circular block to AD with the right reverse knife-hand while maintaining a left walking stance toward D.
patternSteps.35: Step 34. Execute a downward block with an alternate palm while forming a right rear foot stance toward D pulling left foot.
patternSteps.36: Step 35. Execute a middle punch to D with the right fist while forming a right L-stance toward D slipping the left foot.
patternSteps.37: Step 36. Execute a low inward block to D with the left reverse knife-hand while shifting to C maintaining a right L-stance toward D.
patternSteps.38: Step 37. Execute a high reverse turning kick to BD with the right foot.
patternSteps.39: Step 38. Lower the right foot to D forming a left rear foot stance toward D while executing a middle guarding block to D with the forearm.
patternSteps.40: Step 39. Execute a high reverse turning kick to AD with the left foot.
patternSteps.41: Step 40. Lower the left foot to D forming a right rear foot stance toward D while executing a middle guarding block to D with the forearm.
patternSteps.42: Step 41. Move the left foot to the side rear of the right foot and then the right foot to C forming a right L-stance toward D while executing a low outward block to D with the left knife-hand.
patternSteps.43: Step 42. Execute a middle punch to D with the right fist while forming a left walking stance toward D slipping the right foot.
patternSteps.44: Step 43. Move the left foot to C forming a left L-stance toward D while executing a low block to D with the right knife-hand.
patternSteps.45: Step 44. Execute a middle punch to D with the left fist while forming a right walking stance toward D slipping the left foot.
patternSteps.46: Step 45. Execute a high punch to D with the right fist while maintaining a right walking stance toward D.
patternSteps.47: End: Bring the foot back to a ready position
